name: Evercalm Redness Relief Serum
about: What it is:A fast-acting serum clinically demonstrated to visibly reduce redness in just 30 minutes and formulated to soothe seven signs of sensitivity in seven days..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness and Redness.Highlighted Ingredients:-.Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This velvety serum is formulated to reduce the appearance of redness and relieve discomfort for calmer-feeling skin now and with continued use. Made with unique bioactive ingredients chosen for their ability to relieve visible symptoms of sensitivity and stress, it helps to future-proof skin from sensitizing triggers..Clinical Results:In a consumer-study evaluation of 100 men and women, after 7 days:
ingredients: -Albatrellus confluens (White Mushroom Extract): Soothes, protects, and prevents discomfort in redness-prone skin..-Defence Complex (Beta Carotene and Biosaccharide): Defends against oxidative stress and environmental pollution...Aqua (Water), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Propanediol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Squalane, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetyl Phosphate, Crambe Abyssinica Seed Oil, Arginine, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Inulin, Vaccinium Vitis-Idaea Seed Oil, Sclerotium Gum, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Albatrellus Confluens (Mushroom) Extract, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Carboxymethyl Betaglucan, Biosaccharide Gum-4, Laminaria Ochroleuca Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Extract, Beta-Carotene, Xanthophylls, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Geraniol, Linalool...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use morning and night after cleansing with Evercalm Gentle Cleansing Milk or Gel (each sold separately)..-Follow with Evercalm Global Protection Day Cream (sold separately) for additional skin-barrier support. .-In the AM, finish with Clean Screen Mattifying Face Sunscreen SPF 30 (sold separately) to protect your skin from UV damage. .In the PM, finish with Evercalm Overnight Recovery Balm (sold separately) to support your skinu2019s regenerative process.

Make a half size!

reviews.review_text: I received Ren Clean Skincare Evercalm Redness Relief Serum complimentary from @RenSkinCare and @BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. It also helps strengthen your skins moisture barrier, which helps to protect against environmental aggressors. There is a very light, mild smell that absorbs right into your skin. I use it both in my morning & evening skincare routine and I gently press the serum with my fingertips onto my cleansed skin, and reapply as needed. This serum is amazing at restoring stressed skin, along with being gentle on my sensitive skin. I love a skincare product that respects my skin as well as our planet, also that it is a vegan product, and dermatologist tested and approved! I love that they use Albtrellus Confluens (Mushroom Extract) to help in soothing, preventing, and protecting discomfort in redness prone skin. I also love that they use Beta Carotene and Biosaccharide as a defense complex that helps to reduce oxidative stress and helps to keep your skin protected from environmental pollution. I like the packaging, the glass bottle, and that both are recyclable! I really enjoy the design of the bottle, and the pump puts out just as much as you need. With it being clear glass, I am able to see the product, and that helps to be able to see when I need to order more! This product has worked so well on my skin and look forward to trying more products from this brand! I will definitely purchase more when this bottle gets low, and would highly recommend it to people with sensitive skin, or redness prone skin. #RENSKINCARE #RenCleanSkinCare #BzzAgent #complimentary #RednessReliefSerum

That is a dream product and this lives up to that dream!  My skin has always been finicky with most, if not all skin products.  This said it worked for sensitive skin.  I did not believe it at first because so many products say they are for sensitive skin.  I applied one pump in the morning after toner and water based serums, then this product and then my moisturizer and eye cream.    At first I did not notice much of a difference, but now that I have been using it for 3 weeks consistently, I can say the redness is so tamed down now that it's barely noticeable and when I put on foundation, my redness no longer peeks through.  Without a doubt, when this bottle is finished, I will be purchasing another, and another and another.  I have already recommended this to several friends who also suffer from redness/sensitive skin.    There is a slight scent to it, but nothing off putting and it dies down quickly.  Also, I would not recommend putting any facial oils directly over this, put a moisturizer as a barrier and then the facial oil as this tends to pill when an oil is applied directly on top of it.  Make sure to pat this into the skin well.  It does take a bit of time to sink in but the results are worth the wait.  What a great product!

reviews.review_text: I have been use REN redness relief serum for a while now, during one of those hottest days in California. In general, the serum was nice: good fragrance, nice texture, easy to absorb, eco-friendly packaging, etc. But there is one main issue: it did not help with what it is supposed to do: relief the redness on my face! I donu2019t even think my uneven tone was that bad, yet it didnu2019t help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this serum for review and I've been using it for a few weeks now and I love it! I've been having trouble with dry skin due to stress, exacerbated by wearing a mask. It was so bad that I was getting red, splotchy cheeks. Then, this awesome serum arrived in the mail and it's helped immensely! It moisturizes my skin and makes my cheeks less red. Plus, I'm not getting those bumps/splotches now either! I would highly recommend this serum to anyone suffering from similar problems.

reviews.review_text: I received this free in exchange for my honest review. I have a lot of redness and uneven skin tones. This serum was lightweight and did not burn my skin.  I felt it did help relieve redness and was soothing.  I would purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First Off i want to say i love the idea behind this company. i Love that they are eco friendly and package in a glass bottle. I product felt like a cleansing milk, went on smoothly and absorbed quickly. Unfortunally for my skin it cause more acne than i already had .I put it on at night and i woke up with 4 new zits. On the other hand the two spots i did have on my face were no longer red the next morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review! I really really like this product. It really helped to reduce the redness around my nose, which was always an issue I had with my skin. Besides that, I found it worked well to moisturize as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this Ren Evercalm Redness Relief Serum. I use this sometime twice a day and within a few days I noticed a big difference in my skin. I have redness on my cheek area especially during the hotter summer months and this serum has significantly helped my skin appear less red. I love the fact that this serum is vegan and clean. I have somewhat sensitive, oily skin and this serum has worked great for me without irritation. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_text: This serum worked really well for me. It wasnu2019t greasy and absorbed really well. My skin calmed down on the redness really fast. I even have some to my mother in law and it worked wonders but the only thing I didnu2019t care for was the smell.

reviews.review_text: I love this product! I have much redness to my skin and this is a lifesaver. I notice a difference almost immediately. This is my go-to for life!!

reviews.review_text: Really do love this serum. I have sensitive, reactive skin prone to blotchiness and redness and this serum relieves a lot of my concerns instantly but I have also seen improvements in my redness and dryness over the last few weeks since using it. Also love the smell of it!

reviews.review_text: It did calm my skin. But it caused some burning feeling the first 2 minutes until it dried. It feels weird as it is suppose to be calming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was optimistic and excited to get this because it claimed to address literally all of my skin issues, and thereu2019s a lot of them. I tied it on itu2019s own for a few days/nights and I didnu2019t notice any reduction of redness or positive results, the only thing I noticed was that it dried my skin out. I used in in combination with my normal skin care stuff and had the same results as before (nothing) except that my skin was even dryer than before. Maybe I used it wrong or something idk but it was kinda disappointing :(
